      • draw

        public void draw(Graphics2D g2,
                 boolean scale,
                 boolean paintSelection,
                 boolean antialias,
                 boolean drawDetail)
        Description copied from class: GraphView
        Can be called to draw the GraphView onto the specified Graphics context.
        Specified by:
        draw in class GraphView
        Parameters:
        g2 - The Graphics2D on to which the Graph should be drawn.
        scale - If false the scale operation should not be applied to the Graphics2D object.
        paintSelection - If false the selection should not be painted onto the view.
        antialias - If true the view should be antialiased.

        Description copied from interface: Zoomable
        Requests that the zoom level is set to the specified value.
        Parameters:
